member.name: T:XAMPPC2.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:XAMPPC2.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:XAMPPC2.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:XAMPPC2.My.Resources.Resources.apache
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <ServiceTools> <ConfigurationFiles> <Config Title="Apache (httpd.conf)" Source="%xamppdir%\apache\conf\httpd.conf"/> <Config Title="Apache (httpd-ssl.conf)" Source="%xamppdir%\apache\conf\extra\httpd-ssl.conf"/> <Config Title="Apache (httpd-xampp.conf)" Source="%xamppdir%\apache\conf\extra\httpd-xampp.conf"/> <Config Title="PHP (php.ini)" Source="%xamppdir%\php\php.ini"/> <Config Title="phpMyAdmin (config.inc.php)" Source="%xamppdir%\phpMyAdmin\conf [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:XAMPPC2.My.Resources.Resources.filezilla
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <ServiceTools> <ConfigurationFiles> <Config Title="FileZilla Server.xml" Source="%xamppdir%\FileZillaFTP\FileZilla Server.xml"/> </ConfigurationFiles>
<LogFiles> </LogFiles>
<WebApplications> <WebApp Title="Správa serveru" Address="%xamppdir%\filezillaftp\filezilla server interface.exe" /> </WebApplications> </ServiceTools>.

member.name: P:XAMPPC2.My.Resources.Resources.mercury
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <ServiceTools> <ConfigurationFiles> <Config Title="MERCURY.INI" Source="%xamppdir%\MercuryMail\MERCURY.INI"/> </ConfigurationFiles>
<LogFiles> </LogFiles>
<WebApplications> </WebApplications> </ServiceTools>.

member.name: P:XAMPPC2.My.Resources.Resources.mysql
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <ServiceTools> <ConfigurationFiles> <Config Title="MySQL (my.ini)" Source="%xamppdir%\mysql\bin\my.ini"/> </ConfigurationFiles>
<LogFiles> <Log Title="MySQL (mysql_error.log)" Source="%xamppdir%\mysql\data\mysql_error.log" /> </LogFiles>
<WebApplications> <WebApp Title="phpMyAdmin" Address="http://localhost/phpmyadmin" /> </WebApplications> </ServiceTools>.

member.name: P:XAMPPC2.My.Resources.Resources.tomcat
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <ServiceTools> <ConfigurationFiles> <Config Title="server.xml" Source="%xamppdir%\tomcat\conf\server.xml"/> <Config Title="tomcat-users.xml" Source="%xamppdir%\tomcat\conf\tomcat-users.xml"/> <Config Title="web.xml" Source="%xamppdir%\tomcat\conf\web.xml"/> <Config Title="context.xml" Source="%xamppdir%\tomcat\conf\context.xml"/> </ConfigurationFiles>
<LogFiles> </LogFiles>
<WebApplications> </WebApplications> </ServiceTools>.
